<script setup lang="ts">
import { ComboboxRoot, type ComboboxRootProps } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

interface Props extends /* @vue-ignore */ Omit<ComboboxRootProps, 'open' | 'searchTerm'> {
  class?: string
}

const props = defineProps<Props>()
</script>

<template>
  <ComboboxRoot
    v-bind="props"
    :open="true"
    :class="
      cn(
        'flex h-full w-full flex-col overflow-hidden bg-popover text-popover-foreground',
        props.class
      )
    "
  >
    <slot />
  </ComboboxRoot>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { type DialogRootProps } from 'reka-ui'
import { Dialog, DialogContent } from '@/components/ui'
import Command from './Command.vue'

interface Props extends DialogRootProps {
  class?: string
}

const props = defineProps<Props>()
const emit = defineEmits<{
  'update:open': [value: boolean]
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <Dialog v-bind="props" @update:open="emit('update:open', $event)">
    <DialogContent class="overflow-hidden p-0">
      <Command
        class="[&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:px-2 [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:font-bold [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:uppercase [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:tracking-wide [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:text-muted-foreground [&_[cmdk-group]:not([hidden])_~[cmdk-group]]:pt-0 [&_[cmdk-group]]:px-2 [&_[cmdk-input-wrapper]_svg]:h-5 [&_[cmdk-input-wrapper]_svg]:w-5 [&_[cmdk-input]]:h-12 [&_[cmdk-item]]:px-2 [&_[cmdk-item]]:py-3 [&_[cmdk-item]_svg]:h-5 [&_[cmdk-item]_svg]:w-5"
      >
        <slot />
      </Command>
    </DialogContent>
  </Dialog>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ComboboxContent, type ComboboxContentProps } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

interface Props extends /* @vue-ignore */ ComboboxContentProps {
  class?: string
}

const props = defineProps<Props>()
</script>

<template>
  <ComboboxContent
    v-bind="props"
    :class="cn('max-h-[300px] overflow-y-auto overflow-x-hidden', props.class)"
  >
    <slot />
  </ComboboxContent>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ComboboxEmpty } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <ComboboxEmpty :class="cn('py-6 text-center text-sm', $props.class)">
    <slot />
  </ComboboxEmpty>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ComboboxGroup, ComboboxLabel } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
  heading?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <ComboboxGroup
    :class="
      cn(
        'overflow-hidden p-1 text-foreground [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:px-2 [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:py-1.5 [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:text-xs [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:font-bold [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:uppercase [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:tracking-wide [&_[cmdk-group-heading]]:text-muted-foreground',
        $props.class
      )
    "
  >
    <ComboboxLabel v-if="heading" cmdk-group-heading="" class="px-2 py-1.5 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wide text-muted-foreground">
      {{ heading }}
    </ComboboxLabel>
    <slot />
  </ComboboxGroup>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ComboboxItem, type ComboboxItemProps } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

interface Props extends ComboboxItemProps {
  class?: string
}

const props = defineProps<Props>()
const emit = defineEmits<{
  select: [event: Event]
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <ComboboxItem
    v-bind="props"
    :class="
      cn(
        'relative flex cursor-default gap-2 select-none items-center px-2 py-1.5 text-sm outline-none data-[disabled]:pointer-events-none data-[highlighted]:bg-accent data-[highlighted]:text-accent-foreground data-[disabled]:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:size-4 [&_svg]:shrink-0',
        props.class
      )
    "
    @select="emit('select', $event)"
  >
    <slot />
  </ComboboxItem>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ComboboxSeparator } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <ComboboxSeparator :class="cn('-mx-1 h-px bg-foreground', $props.class)" />
</template>
